metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0561 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
In append_to_verify_fifo_interleaved_ of stream_encoder.c, there is apossible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could leadto local information disclosure with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-174302683

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-0561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flac - 1.3.3-2ubuntu0.1
libflac++6v5 - 1.3.3-2ubuntu0.1
libflac8 - 1.3.3-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flac package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-2ubuntu0.1').
